categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems space stations

nodes.text: Space Station Trenchant was located in the Trax sector in the Mid Rim. It was the scene of the battle between Asajj Ventress, Durge and General Grievous. Grievous's victory ensured that it was he who became Supreme Commander of the Droid Armies of the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

The space station itself contained many artifacts and displayed animals as well as rare living specimens in bacta tanks. The space station had many other relics as well, including various weaponry. There were also collections of lightsabers and Jedi robes. Suits of armor, antique vases, ancient speeders, skeletons, statues of Count Dooku, droids, and globes were present as well.
Star Wars: The Comics Companion first located Space Station Trenchant in the Outer Rim Territories.
